description.value:
Activate 1 (manipulate)

With much of New Thassilon located among the rugged heights of the Kodar Mountains, these elixirs have grown in popularity among those frequently travel the region. For 1 day, drinking this elixir while in mountainous terrain protects you from the effects of severe cold and grants you a +3 item bonus to Athletics checks made to Climb, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.High Jump], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Long Jump], as well as to saving throws against the effects of high altitude. The elixir also protects against extreme cold.

publication.title: Pathfinder #219: Lord of the Trinity Star
